title: Vance is Trump's top messenger. This could be his hardest sell yet.
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance is embracing his role as salesman-in-chief for Donald Trump’s agenda and taking charge of a rebrand of the GOP's tax law.

title: FEMA workers put on leave after signing letter criticizing Trump leadership
shortDescription: Several FEMA workers have been placed on leave after signing a scathing letter to Congress criticizing President Trump's leadership.

title: 'Calm down,' White House tells Denmark amid Greenland report
shortDescription: Denmark's public broadcaster reported Americans sought to sway Greenlandic attitudes in favor of President Trump's desire to acquire the territory.

title: Vance says Trump is in 'good health' in exclusive interview
shortDescription: Vance's boss, President Trump, is the oldest person to be sworn in as president of the United States.

title: Vance says Trump in 'incredibly good health'
shortDescription: In an exclusive interview, Vice President JD Vance said while he is ready for the presidency, President Donald Trump is in "good health."

title: Lisa Cook files federal lawsuit to fight Trump firing her from Fed
shortDescription: The case could reach the Supreme Court as Cook and Trump debate the extent of the president's power to remove an official from the Fed board.

title: Senate fight erupts in Mexico
shortDescription: Alejandro Moreno and Gerardo Fernandez Norona clashed in the Mexican Senate after debating on foreign forces.

title: CDC Director fired amid White House clash over public health agenda
shortDescription: The White House says it has fired CDC Director Susan Monarez after she refused to resign, citing her lack of alignment with President Trump's agenda.

title: How many executive orders has Trump signed? Outpaces other presidents
shortDescription: How many executive orders has President Donald Trump signed in his presidency? The latest sought a penalty for flag burning and to stop cashless bail.

title: Trump's gold-splashed Oval Office has seal of approval from VP's kid
shortDescription: JD Vance told USA TODAY the Oval Office was "kind of dark and gloomy" before President Trump gave it a gold-heavy makeover.

title: VP Vance praises Trump’s golden Oval Office
shortDescription: In an exclusive interview, Vice President JD Vance shares how his son is dazzled by President Donald Trump’s golden Oval Office redesign.

title: Wikipedia under investigation by Republicans over alleged bias
shortDescription: Republicans in Congress said on Wednesday, Aug. 27, that they opened a probe into Wikipedia, alleging they had organized efforts to “inject bias."

title: DOGE put Americans' Social Security data at risk, whistleblower says
shortDescription: DOGE has created "a live copy of the entire country’s Social Security information," a Social Security official says in a whistleblower complaint.

title: In exclusive interview, VP Vance defends Trump firing Fed's Lisa Cook
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance defended Trump's firing of a Fed official but denied the president has an enemies list.

title: Exclusive - Vance blames Zelenskyy blowup on Biden's Ukraine policy
shortDescription: “Sometimes people disagree,” Vance said of his televised Oval Office spat with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy earlier this year.

title: Exclusive: VP Vance denies Trump enemies list
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said President Donald Trump is focused on law enforcement, not political retaliation, in an exclusive interview.

title: Here's what several new polls say about Trump's approval rating
shortDescription: Four leading pollsters released surveys this week, amid the president's controversial National Guard deployments to the nation's capital. Here's what they say.

title: White House fires CDC director, but she refuses to step down
shortDescription: The White House said it fired CDC Director Susan Monarez after she refused to step down, yet she still claims she hasn't left her post.
